TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EnumConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供将 对象与其他各种表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器只能枚举对象与字符串之间实现转换。This converter can only convert an enumeration object to and from a string. 类提供属性来获取可枚举的值进行排序的接口。The class provides the property to get an interface that can be used to sort the values of the enumeration. 默认情况下，它们在文件中出现的顺序排序的枚举值。By default, the enumeration values are sorted in the order they appear in the file. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 决不要创建的实例。You should never create an instance of an . 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将转换类型的变量的为一个字符串，反之亦然。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string, and vice versa. 该示例需要您声明的调用`Servers`和它包含以下成员：The example requires that you have declared an called `Servers` and that it has the following members: ``` Windows=1, Exchange=2, BizTalk=3 ``` [!code-cpp[Converters#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[Converters#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#12)] [!code-vb[Converters#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#12)]

para.span: 如果你想要按不同顺序排序的值，重写属性。

span.span: If you want to sort the values into a different order, override the property.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此转换器是否可使用指定上下文将给定源类型的对象转换为枚举对象。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to an enumeration object using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果该转换器能够执行转换，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器只能枚举对象与字符串之间实现转换。This converter can only convert an enumeration object to and from a string. `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器只能枚举对象与字符串之间实现转换。This converter can only convert an enumeration object to and from a string. `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 枚举标记有的任何字段设置为`false`不会返回。Any fields of the enumeration that are marked with set to `false` will not be returned.
